sentences.sContent: Young people today are under intense pressure to succeed.
sentences.sCn: 如今的年轻人面临要出人头地的巨大压力。

sentences.sContent: the intense heat of the desert
The pain was so intense I couldn’t sleep.
He took an intense interest in all religious matters.
sentences.sCn: 他对所有宗教事宜都很感兴趣。

sentences.sContent: ...Melanomas are more common if you have periodic intense exposure to the sun...

exam.question: The music aroused an _______ feeling of homesickness in him.

answer.explain: an intense feeling of... ：  一种强烈的…的感觉。 句意：  音乐激起他强烈的思乡之情。 intentional：  有意的， 故意的； intermittent：  间歇的， 断断续续的； intrinsic：  内在的， 本质的。

synos.tran: 强烈的；紧张的；非常的；热情的

remMethod.val: in ＋ tense(紧张的) → 紧张的

words.tran: 加强的；集中的；透彻的；加强语气的
强度；强烈；[电子] 亮度；紧张
强度，烈度；加强，加剧；紧张
使加强，使强化；使变激烈

trans.tranOther: having a very strong effect or felt very strongly
